mapper.select: SELECT g.group_id, g.group_name, g.avatar AS group_avatar, u.id AS invited_by_id, u.username AS invited_by_username, u.nickname AS invited_by_nickname, uf.remark AS invited_by_remark, gi.`status`, gi.create_time FROM ec_group_invitation gi LEFT JOIN ec_group g ON gi.group_id = g.group_id LEFT JOIN ec_user u ON u.id = gi.invited_by LEFT JOIN ec_user_friend uf ON uf.friend_id = gi.invited_by WHERE gi.invited_user_id = #{userId} AND uf.uid = #{userId} AND g.deleted = 0 AND u.deleted = 0 AND uf.deleted = 0

SELECT g.group_id, g.group_name, g.avatar AS group_avatar, u.id AS inviter_id, u.username AS inviter_username, u.nickname AS inviter_nickname, u1.id AS invited_by_id, u1.username AS invited_by_username, u1.nickname AS invited_by_nickname, gi.`status`, gi.create_time FROM ec_group_invitation gi LEFT JOIN ec_group g ON gi.group_id = g.group_id LEFT JOIN ec_user u ON u.id = gi.invited_user_id LEFT JOIN ec_user u1 ON u1.id = gi.invited_by LEFT JOIN ec_group_member gm ON gm.group_id = gi.group_id WHERE gm.role > 0 AND gm.user_id = 10 AND g.deleted = 0 AND u.deleted = 0
